You've Got Options
We want you to have options because one size doesn't fit all. Compare the different membership plans below. Then choose the best fit for you.
Most Popular
CLUB Memberships
The CLUB Membership is perfect for golfers who enjoy playing their game into shape. Â Get situational practice and play without spending countless hours beating balls outdoors. Tap the button below to join and create your account.
Schedule up to 3 hrs at a time
Have up to 3 hrs at any time reserved in the simulator bays.
Practice, play, and compete
Play and practice on world-famous courses. Compete in our local and national tournaments without ever having to pack a bag or book a flight.
Priority lessons and discounts
Schedule private lessons with Shaun and Mike, and receive member pricing on lessons with our certified instructors and fitters.

The TOUR Membership is designed to provide the most dedicated golfers with everything they need to hone their game. The included 3D sessions will ensure focused improvement in the most effective way possible.

* Hours may be booked consecutively or spread across days/weeks. Once an hour is used, it may replaced by another reservation. This only limits the number of reservations that can held at any one time. This system ensures bookings are fair and equitable while preventing the possibility of monopolising the finite resource of available reservations.
Corporate Memberships
And Events
Corporate memberships and events are available. Please contact us for more information.
Contact us
Frequently Asked Questions
Do I have to sign a contract when I join?
No. You are free to cancel your membership at anytime for any reason. You will have access for the remainder of your pre-paid membership term, but you will not be renewed or charged again.
Cancelations MUST be made in writing by emailing support@athleticmotiongolf.com.
If I need to cancel, do you offer refunds?
Yes. The refund policies for each membership level are as follows:
BASE Membership: you may receive a refund for the balance in your member account.
CLUB Membership: you may receive a refund for any unused months remaining on your annual plan. You will not receive a refund for current or past months based on your plan start date.
TOUR Membership: you may receive a refund for any unused months remaining on your annual plan. You will not receive a refund for current or past months based on your plan start date.
Can I change memberships if I want to?
Of course. We can change your membership at the front desk for you, or you can login to the website (and app) and make the changes at anytime.
Do I need to be TOUR Member to get lessons from Mike and Shaun?
No. Although membership perks offer huge savings, you will always be able to book lessons, clinics, AMGÂ schools, and events. You can book them all from your phone or computer once logged into your account.
Can I book lessons, clinics, schools and fittings if I'm not a member?
Yes. You'll just need to create an account on the website or app. Once you have an account set up, you'll be able to book any of our services a la carte.
Can I bring family members?
Yes. Immediate family members (spouse and children living at home) are included in the TOURÂ Membership. CLUB Members can add family members to their membership for a small charge. BASE members can pay for additional members when they visit as well.
Can I stay longer than 1-2 hrs at the BASE/CLUB member levels?  What If I want to stay longer?
We want to make sure all members get the experience they expect. To respect all members, we have 2 hr limits on hitting bay reservations for BASE/CLUB members. If you've made a reservation during a slow period, and there are no reservations scheduled after you, you are welcome to continue playing. Keep in mind that the AMGC experience is not like a driving range, this is like working on your game in a microwave. If you're practicing the right way, with all the feedback available, practicing longer than 2 hrs can often be detrimental.
Still have questions?
Let us know how we can help.
